Qpx Design

QPX Design

Web Development Project created by Quinn Patwardhan

Why?

This project's main goal is to create a suite of web tools that allow users to quickly complete everyday tasks. We hope to be a one-stop-shop for all web tools, and to expand our varity of tools everyday.

How?

This web project was coded entirely by Quinn Patwardhan using HTML, CSS, and Javascript (with the jQuery plugin). This project is hosted by Github Pages.

Learn More

To learn more information about both this Project and about Quinn, visit the following links: my LinkedIn, my personal website, and my GitHub Homepage.

Website History:

Dec. 10th, 2021 - Project Started

Dec. 11th, 2021 - Avacado Math, Color Flipper, and Password Generator created

Dec. 12th, 2021 - Grade Calculator and Currency Converter created

Dec. 13th, 2021 - GPA Calculator and Capitalization Changer created

Dec. 14th, 2021 - About & Contact Pages Created
